resources.string: Your task is to find all the translations of a word in the grid.

You can select a word by pressing down on a letter in the grid, dragging to another one, and then releasing your finger. If the selected word is a valid translation, it will be highlighted. When all the translations will be found, you will see a new grid.
Translations in the grid will only ever appear horizontally (left to right), vertically (top to bottom) or diagonally (left to right, top to bottom).
